popoverBasicCode:
<button
    nz-button
    nz-popover
    nzType="primary"
    nzTitle="Title"
    nzContent="Content">
    Hover me
</button>
popoverPlacementCode:
Content

Content
popoverPointingCode:
<button class="m-r-10" nz-button nzTitle="Title" nzContent="Content" nzPlacement="topLeft" nz-popover>Align edge </button>
<button nz-button nzTitle="Title" nzContent="Content" nzPlacement="topCenter" nz-popover>Arrow points to center</button>
popoverTemplateCode: Title Content
popoverTriggerCode:
<button class="m-r-10" nz-button nz-popover nzTitle="Title" [nzContent]="contentTemplate" nzTrigger="click">Click me</button>
<button class="m-r-10" nz-button nz-popover nzTitle="Title" [nzContent]="contentTemplate" nzTrigger="hover">Hover me</button>
<button nz-button nz-popover nzTitle="Title" [nzContent]="contentTemplate" nzTrigger="focus">Focus me</button>
